price: 176. Yango wana na bosôló mpenza, Allah akitisaki buku. mpe ya sôló ba oyo bakesanaki mpe babuaki maye mazali okati ya buku, bazali na bokeseni monene.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَفِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha nazzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wa-inna alladhīna ikh'talafū fī al-kitābi lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
